plot: Welcome to the endless shift of four shelf-stackers on the bottom rung of Grogans supermarket's pecking order. Banter, pranks, messing with the customer - any outlet is fair game. There's only one rule - Don't get fired.
plot_en: Welcome to the endless shift of four shelf-stackers on the bottom rung of Grogans supermarket's pecking order. Banter, pranks, messing with the customer - any outlet is fair game. There's only one rule - Don't get fired.

title: Shelfstackers
